column3: I'm going to park here and walk in. I don't want to drive into a zoo. He glanced at his watch. "It's only five-twenty. Kidnapper's call is supposed to come at six. We've got time."
If she can keep her speed to seventy until she leaves the turnpike at midtown, and if she catches most of the traffic lights, she estimates she can be at her building by five-twenty.

The Meeting was listed as starting at 1730, and it was only around 1720, and Hal thought the voices might signify some sort of pre-Meeting orientation for people who've come for the first time, sort of tentatively, just to scout the whole enterprise out, so he doesn't knock.
